Dave McKenzie bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nkiri na ihe nkírí nke amụrụ na Kingston, Jamaica

Ihe ngosi onwé ónyé na-adịbeghị ányá gụnyere: Ihe niile dị mma, ihe ọ bụla dị mmá na Rosenwald-Wolf Gallery na Mahadum nkè Arts, Philadelphia, PA; Dave McKenzie, na Aspen Art Museum na Aspen, Colorado; Screen Doors on Submarines, REDCAT, Los Angeles; na Dave McKenzie
The Institute of Contemporary Art, Boston

A gụnyere ọrụ McKenzie na Akụkọ Ihe Mere Eme, na Birmingham Museum of Art, Birmingham, AL; Ọnụnọ: Black Performance in Contemporary Art, na Contemporary Arts Museum Houston, Houston, TX; na ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ na RISD Museum, Providence, RI; New York, NY; Indianapolis Museum of Art. Ọ natara onyinye Foundation for Contemporary Arts Grants to Artists (2018).
N'afọ 2000, ọ nwetara BFA na printmaking na Mahadum nke Arts nà Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, wee gaa Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture.
